actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow deferral of gain from sale or exchange of certain livestock due to flooding.

summary.text: Allows deferral of gain for tax purposes from the sale or exchange of livestock due to flooding by authorizing the treatment of such sale or exchange as an involuntary conversion under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow deferral of gain from sale or exchange of certain livestock due to flooding.
